title: Stage Lv3-P1-S06
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: This building was built in 1950. (completion variant 1)
The meeting will be held tomorrow. (completion variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: This building was built in 1950. (completion variant 1)
The meeting will be held tomorrow. (completion variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 책은 많은 사람들에게 읽히고 있습니다. (완성 1)
sentences.en: This book is being read by many people. (completion variant 1)
The project has been completed successfully. (completion variant 1)
New policies are being implemented. (completion variant 1)
The problem must be solved. (completion variant 1)
The results will be announced soon. (completion variant 1)
This product is made in Korea. (completion variant 1)
The letter was sent yesterday. (completion variant 1)
The plan has been modified. (completion variant 1)
This building was built in 1950. (completion variant 2)
The meeting will be held tomorrow. (completion variant 2)
